item.title: As consumers fret, executives have been talking a little less about inflation — and more about this

item.title: My stepmother inherited 100% of my father’s estate. She’s leaving everything to her two kids. Is that fair?
item.description: “I had a wonderful relationship with my father.”

item.title: ‘In their last days, our parents changed their will’: They left me $250,000, but gave my sister $1 million. What should I do?
item.description: “How many people maintain a relationship with their siblings after their parents died?”

item.title: I almost bought a $600K house, but a neighbor told me it has an ‘unsafe’ extension with no foundation. Does the seller have a duty to reveal this?
item.description: “The next-door neighbor was going to buy it, but the seller warned him off.”
